content: उपचर्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} To be served or waited upon; to be honoured or worshipped; <ls>Ms. 5. 154</ls>; अनुपचर्ये (भृत्ये) <ls>Pt. 1. 101</ls> not requiring flattery, unassuming; दुःख° <ls>Mu. 3. 5</ls> difficult to serve. --र्या {@--1@} Service, attendance. {@--2@} Physicking, treating, curing.
